values:
My old journal is going to be for my day to day stuff.

re-add it.

www.livejournal.com/users/itsatragedy____

This is day one.

I decided I've got to do something with all this anger and depression over something I will never have and putting it to good use. I want to lose weight, and I think I finally have the motivation to do so. I went out and actually walked for about a mile and a half or so -- then called Ryan trying to see if he could get me into his gym. The shitty thing was it cost 3 bucks to get in which I didnt have which sucked. I then went to work and ended up making a salad without any rice or cheese on it trying to avoid that shit.

My current weight is 220lbs.
My waist size is somewhere between 38 and 40.

My goal is to get to 180lbs
And a wasit of 32.

It's going to be a hard hard hard, but it will be worth it.

My new diet is just common sense stuff for right now. I'm giving up all red meat, potatoes, ketchup, rice, starch, and hopefully bread on a give or take basis on it. I'm also going to give up soda's and try to stick to Unsweet Tea and water again.
I really hope this pays off. 

I cut two pictures of how my body looks now, hopefully in a few months I can look back and say "man, I really was fat as fuck."

haha.

Type your cut contents here.

FRIENDS ONLY.
ATTENTION.

I will no loner use this journal for bitch and complaining. It is worthless to even put energy into something so futile. Instead I'm going to use this journal for something positive and it will become a log book for my new weight loss plan. It will be friends only, with the exception of a few public entries when I feel I have made some positive headway. 

Thank you.  -- Kerry.
